message.body: Lol. Totally am. Sorry. I got back and just passed out... How are you? The mall was packed...

Hahahah glad to know. Yea I was hoping you didn't get into bad altercations at the mall. I'm good. After I babysat and went home, my friend called and I ended up going out with her to a gay club near Center City. It was pretty short notice so I just threw stuff together. It was quite an entertaining night. Got home not too long ago. Did you get anything good?
I got a snowboarding helmet. Lol. How was the gay bar? I hear they're fun. lol

This one was actually pretty cool. I went to another one before, it was kind of boring (although that one was a bar/lounge, and the one I went to earlier was a club club). The music was good, they had an event tonight.
Snowboarding helmet huh? I guess I know what you'll be doing this winter.
Yeah, I wanted one for a while and it made sense to get it now.
I haven't been snowboarding in a while. Matter of fact, the last time I went was with you! Hahahah. I already miss the warm weather.
